sentences.en: ...a full-time job as a supervisor at a factory.
sentences.cn: …在一家工厂担任监督员的一项全职工作。

sentences.en: Ann really fancies her chances of promotion to the vacant job of chief supervisor.
sentences.cn: 安过分自信她会被提升到还空缺的主管人的职位.

sentences.en: Each student has a supervisor to advise on the writing of the dissertation.
sentences.cn: 每个学生都有导师指导他们写论文。

sentences.en: Have you decided yet who's going to be the day shift supervisor?
sentences.cn: 你决定提升谁做白天班的主管了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He said I was too flighty to be a good supervisor.
sentences.cn: 他说我太轻浮不能成为一名好的管理员.

sentences.en: He said that he needed to get his supervisor to authorize my refund.
sentences.cn: 他说必须让主管人员批准我的退款.

sentences.en: His supervisor recommended that he be promoted to junior programmer.
sentences.cn: 他的上司推荐他晋升为初级程序员.

sentences.en: I have a meeting with my supervisor about my research topic.
sentences.cn: 我要就我的研究课题同导师见一次面。

sentences.en: Soon after, Joe was promoted to senior supervisor.
sentences.cn: 不久, 乔被升为高级总管.

sentences.en: Sylvia does not get on with the supervisor and the danger is that he will trump up some charge to discredit her.
sentences.cn: 西尔维亚与主管人相处得不好,因而害怕他会捏造一些罪名使她名誉扫地.

sentences.en: The maintenance supervisor would dispatch a crew to repair the damage.
sentences.cn: 维修管理人将派一组人去修理损坏的地方.

sentences.en: The malcontent is gunning for his supervisor.
sentences.cn: 那个心怀不满的人在伺机加害他的上司.

sentences.en: The supervisor recommended me for a promotion.
The supervisor said that the new potato peeling machine would come tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 管理员说新的马铃薯剥皮机明天就送来了.

sentences.en: The workers always fool around when the supervisor steps out.
sentences.cn: 当工头一走开,工人就到处游荡.
那个 “ 监工 ” 兴高采烈地拍着手叫着.

words.tran_cn: 监督（supervise的过去式和过去分词）；指导
监督人，[管理]管理人；检查员

phrases.tran_cn: 操作管理程序，操作主管人
安全监督员；安全督导员
销售主管；销售监管；销售主任
管态，管理方式；监督模态

trans.tran_en: someone who supervises a person or activity
